welcome message: It looks like you are new here, Please enter a nickname to proceed.
no rooms yet: No rooms yet. Create one maybe?
create a new room: Let's create a new room. It just needs a name.
not a player yet: You are not a player in this room yet. Fancy joinning?
player won game description: {{nickname}} found load of $t(card.red), enough to get two points.

ready.title: Ready
ready.description:
Choose a card when it's your turn. You can choose between a $t(card.red) and a $t(card.black).

Choose wisely! If you become the challenger you need $t(card.red) cards only to win. However if another player is the challenger you want them to find a $t(card.black).

turns.title: Playing
turns.description:
Keep playing cards, or place a bet.

You can bet on the number of $t(card.red) cards you will be able to find amongst all cards played.

bets.title: Bets
bets.description:
The current bet is {{last_bet}}. Will you dare to bet higher?

If not, you can give up for this round.

challenge.title: Challenge
challenge.description: The challenger will now reveal {{last_bet}} cards one by one, starting by their own. The cards at the top of the stack must be revealed first.

network.abandon: Impossible to establish a connection to the server.

room.reset: {{nickname}} reset the room. Let's start again!
